section.name: Create documentation for your project.
section.p: "PHP for Maven" extends the default documentation of Maven with an doxygen Goall. The goal is configured through:
section.subsection:
Maven generates an standard documenation. Through the doxygen goal a api doc is created. The doxygen configuration file must be located under src/site/doxygen/doxygen.conf. Following parameters of the doxygen conf will be replaced through the plugin.
INPUT OUTPUT_DIRECTORY PROJECT_NAME PROJECT_NUMBER
